parking lot.flavorText:
In the distant year of 2021, an advanced infectious airborne 
disease has turned the population into Divoc Zombies. 
All that remains is you and a few of your fellow Faction members. 
You must navigate through three heavily infected areas to find 
the magical antidote and locate your friends and family to free them 
from a life of Divoc Suffering. 

  If you fail, you will become a Divoc.
